name: Growing Broke
description:
You need to grow crops and sell it to stay alive, but something  is making your life  even harder that it  already is:

The cat-bot sometimes has a mind of its own. We’re not quite sure how. It likes ruining your stuff, or if you're lucky enough it might just help you. It's a cat after all, and we all know that these felines are full of mischief and pretty much  unpredictable. *shows cat.exe-has-stopped-working.png*

Gather 10k Nekocoins and Another Evil Corp might just spare you.

Oh and you  don't even want to find out what happens when you go too negative..

------------------------------

Albert Leung - Art

Lon3r (Lone Rabbit)  - Art

Zach B (baltergeist) - Music

------------------------------

If the webGL version does not work properly,  try using chrome if you haven't already, or try downloading the game instead!

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. 

Enjoy! ^^
